resources.description: In view of the objected target of the development of "orientation type" talented persons, the students should be not only inducted the basic knowledge and theories, but also be trained self-educated ability, application ability, innovation ability and experiment ability. The paper studies teaching practice of the structure experiment from perspectives of theories teaching, practice teaching, teaching means, investigation ways and feasibility. In this paper, suggestions on teaching method of the structure experiment are presented which might be the reference to other college.
resources.name: Teaching Reform and Exploration of "Structure Experiment"

name: teaching-reform-and-exploration-of-structure-experiment

title: Teaching Reform and Exploration of "Structure Experiment"
